column4: Need hepl please, Ubuntu 11.10 installed skype and can't find it how do I launch or use installed apps
Need help  noob please, Ubuntu 11.10 installed skype and can't find it how do I launch or use installed apps
use Dash home, search for it
on the left, dash home. when you click it your screen gets darker and you see sub-menus on the right. skype will be in the internet category
